conflicts.description: geopm-service: LevelZero and NVML support are mutually exclusive
conflicts.name: +nvml

dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools
dependencies.name: automake

dependencies.description: Programmable completion functions for bash.
dependencies.name: bash-completion

dependencies.description:
CUDA is a parallel computing platform and programming model invented by
NVIDIA. It enables dramatic increases in computing performance by
harnessing the power of the graphics processing unit (GPU). Note: This
package does not currently install the drivers necessary to run CUDA.
These will need to be installed manually. See:
https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/ for details.
dependencies.name: cuda

dependencies.description:
Doxygen is the de facto standard tool for generating documentation from
annotated C++ sources, but it also supports other popular programming
languages such as C, Objective-C, C#, PHP, Java, Python, IDL (Corba,
Microsoft, and UNO/OpenOffice flavors), Fortran, VHDL, Tcl, and to some
extent D..
dependencies.name: doxygen

dependencies.description:
The file command is "a file type guesser", that is, a command-line tool
that tells you in words what kind of data a file contains
dependencies.name: file

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
Libcap implements the user-space interfaces to the POSIX 1003.1e
capabilities available in Linux kernels. These capabilities are a
partitioning of the all powerful root privilege into a set of distinct
privileges.
dependencies.name: libcap

dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.
dependencies.name: libtool

dependencies.description:
This is the io_uring library, liburing. liburing provides helpers to
setup and teardown io_uring instances, and also a simplified interface
for applications that don't need (or want) to deal with the full kernel
side implementation.
dependencies.name: liburing

dependencies.description:
oneAPI Level Zero Loader. Applications that need low-level control of a
oneAPI level zero device link against the loader. The loader depends on
a separately installed level zero driver. See https://dgpu-
docs.intel.com/technologies/level-zero.html for information on how to
install the driver.
dependencies.name: oneapi-level-zero

dependencies.description: Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code
dependencies.name: py-cffi

dependencies.description:
Dasbus is a DBus library written in Python 3, based on GLib and inspired
by pydbus.
dependencies.name: py-dasbus

dependencies.description: Parse Python docstrings in reST, Google and Numpydoc format.
dependencies.name: py-docstring-parser

dependencies.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely.
dependencies.name: py-geopmdpy

dependencies.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.
dependencies.name: py-jsonschema

dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.
dependencies.name: py-psutil

dependencies.description: Pygments is a syntax highlighting package written in Python.
dependencies.name: py-pygments

dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.
dependencies.name: py-pyyaml

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependencies.description: Sphinx Documentation Generator.
dependencies.name: py-sphinx

dependencies.description: ReadTheDocs.org theme for Sphinx.
dependencies.name: py-sphinx-rtd-theme

dependencies.description: Create tabbed content in Sphinx documentation when building HTML.
dependencies.name: py-sphinx-tabs

dependencies.description: An extension to use emoji codes in your Sphinx documentation!
dependencies.name: py-sphinxemoji

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description:
systemd is a suite of basic building blocks for a Linux system. It
provides a system and service manager that runs as PID 1 and starts the
rest of the system.
dependencies.name: systemd

dependencies.description: Unzip is a compression and file packaging/archive utility.
dependencies.name: unzip

dependent_to.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Runtime is designed to
enhance energy efficiency of applications through active hardware
configuration.
dependent_to.name: geopm-runtime

description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely. Note:
GEOPM interfaces with hardware using Model Specific Registers (MSRs).
For proper usage make sure MSRs are made available via the msr or msr-
safe kernel modules by your administrator.
name: geopm-service

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Enables the use of oneAPI Level Zero loader
variants.name: levelzero

variants.description: Enables the use of libcap to do capabilities checks
variants.name: libcap

variants.description: Enables the use of liburing for batch I/O
variants.name: liburing

variants.description: Enable direct use of standard msr device driver
variants.name: rawmsr
